articles.author: Skye Jacobs
articles.title: Stanford's brain-computer interface turns inner speech into spoken words - TechSpot
articles.description: Four people living with severe paralysis, caused by conditions including amyotrophic lateral sclerosis and brainstem stroke, took part in the trial. One participant could only respond by...
articles.content: Forward-looking: Stanford University researchers have unveiled a brain-computer interface capable of translating imagined words directly from neural activity into speech marking a first in neurotechn… [+3404 chars]
